DOC.brief_summary: Objective : To investigate correlation total bioavailable serum 25-OH vitamin D , ovarian reserve ovarian response control stimulation egg donor .
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Retrospective study . Setting : University affiliate private IVF center . Intervention : Serum analysis vitamin D , bioavailable vitamin D , antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) , antral follicular count ( AFC ) , reproductive outcome oocytes recipient Main outcome measure : AMH , AFC , number oocyte retrieve number mature oocytes , pregnancy implantation rate donate oocyte ` recipient .
DOC.criteria: Caucasian race , 18 34 year age , donor normal menstrual cycle 2634 day , normal weight range ( BMI 18 25 Kg/m2 ) , normal uterus ovary transvaginal ultrasound ( sign polycystic ovarian syndrome ) , antral follicle count ( AFC ) > 10 , normal karyotype current past exposure radiation hazardous chemical substance , history drug use , family history hereditary chromosomal disease , sexually transmit disease
